iplb_zone_add_plural_success: You will need to finalise the zone additions.

iplb_zone_activate_plural_error: An error has occurred reactivating the zones: {{message}}
iplb_zone_add_available_released: A deletion request has already been submitted for this zone. It will become effective at the end of the billing period. However, you can still add it again.

iplb_zone_delete_intro_text_plural: Select a maximum of {{zoneQuantity}} availability zones

iplb_zone_delete_plural_success: The "{{zones}}" zones will be deleted at the end of the billing period.

iplb_zone_delete_selection_too_many_plur: Please select a maximum of {{zoneQuantity}} availability zones

iplb_zone_delete_single_error: An error has occurred deleting the zone: {{message}}
iplb_zone_delete_plural_error: An error has occurred deleting the zones: {{message}}
iplb_zone_delete_unavailable_already_rel: This availability zone will be deleted at the end of the billing period.
